summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to and amending Plat 37W, Page 104 of the Official Zoning Map of the City of Seattle, Ordinance 86300, to rezone certain property in Block 23, Capitol Hill Addition, Division 2 from Single Family Residence High Density (RS 5000) Zone to Multiple Residence High Density (RMH 350) Zone, authorizing execeptions from the Zoning Ordinance pursuant to the Housing Cooperation Law and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Harry B. Rich, C.F. 287949).
